about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, GB Logistics Commerce Limited is engaged in the business of Logistics.

The company offers qualified drivers, a fleet of vehicles, and a charter network for flexibility, responsiveness, and high-capacity transportation.

The company offers full truckload freight services to large and medium-sized enterprises, leveraging both its own and third-party transportation resources to efficiently manage logistics.

The company operates in two Business Segments Logisticsand Trading of Agricultural Commodities.

In Logistics the company offers Full Truck Load, special handling, godown-to-godown transportation, above-ground floor deliveries, and expertise in Out of Delivery Area (ODA) shipments to remote and challenging locations.

In Trading of Agricultural Commodities the company focuses on logistics near agricultural commodities, capitalizing on incidental trading opportunities to generate additional revenue, and diversifying income while supporting the agricultural and logistics sectors.

As of January 15, 2024, the company has 39 full-time employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Robust Fleet and Infrastructure
  • Expertise and Experience
  • Strategic Partnerships

faqs.question: What is the GB Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer:
GB Logistics IPO is a SME IPO of 2457600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.07 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹102 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on January 24, 2025, and closes on January 28, 2025.

Maashitla Securities Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in GB Logistics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in GB Logistics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in GB Logistics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in GB Logistics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'GB Logistics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When GB Logistics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The GB Logistics IPO opens on January 24, 2025 and closes on January 28, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of GB Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: GB Logistics IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,22,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for GB Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in GB Logistics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is GB Logistics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for GB Logistics IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 29, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, January 30, 2025. Check the GB Logistics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is GB Logistics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The GB Logistics IPO listing date is on Friday, January 31, 2025.
